column5: Detached guest home, in a gated community, hidden beneath a canopy of beautiful oak trees just minutes from downtown Austin and even closer to Circuit of the Americas. This location also allows for easy day trips to Wimberley, New Braunfels, Fredricksburg and the rest of the Texas Hill Country. Perfect location for UT football, ACL festival SXSW and any event at Circuit of the Americas. This newly built charmer includes plenty of privacy, and access to a beautiful outdoor patio with fire pit.
